message.content: {"id": "120216", "title": "Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set.", "description": "", "OB": "When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, and then a new table group is created, the group dialog is not shown. However, the user should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.", "EB": "The group dialog is not shown when attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset. The expected behavior is that the group dialog should be displayed regardless of whether the dataset is defined or not.", "SR": ""}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
